songs.title: Got to Be There
songs.lyrics:
Got to be there, got to be there
In the morning
When she says hello to the world

songs.title: Rockin" Robin
songs.lyrics:
Rockin" Robin, tweet, tweet, tweet
Rockin" Robin, tweet, tweet, tweet

songs.title: I Wanna Be Where You Are
songs.lyrics:
I wanna be where you are
Anywhere you are

songs.title: Don"t Stop "Til You Get Enough
songs.lyrics:
Don"t stop "til you get enough
Keep on with the force, don"t stop

songs.title: Rock with You
songs.lyrics:
Girl, close your eyes
Let that rhythm get into you

songs.title: Off the Wall
songs.lyrics:
So tonight, gotta leave that nine to five upon the shelf
And just enjoy yourself

songs.title: Thriller
songs.lyrics:
It"s close to midnight
And something evil"s lurking in the dark

songs.title: Beat It
songs.lyrics:
Just beat it, beat it
No one wants to be defeated

songs.title: Billie Jean
songs.lyrics:
Billie Jean is not my lover
She"s just a girl who claims that I am the one

songs.title: Bad
songs.lyrics:
Your butt is mine
Gonna tell you right

songs.title: The Way You Make Me Feel
songs.lyrics: Hey pretty baby with the high heels on

songs.title: Man in the Mirror
songs.lyrics: I"m starting with the man in the mirror

songs.title: Black or White
songs.lyrics: I took my baby on a Saturday bang

songs.title: Remember the Time
songs.lyrics:
Do you remember
When we fell in love?

songs.title: Dangerous
songs.lyrics: The way she came into the place
